content.body: That Amount presentation was more well-received than I expected
The late-agenda addition might have contributed to the lack of opposition, though. We should cover our bases with the known stakeholders before we come back again.

yeah, it's interesting that the "skinny amount" that people were asking for earlier in the year ended up being precisely *not* what's preferable. it's so nice to have KG on-side, or on-side-ish at least
content.formatted_body: yeah, it's interesting that the "skinny amount" that people were asking for earlier in the year ended up being precisely not what's preferable. it's so nice to have KG on-side, or on-side-ish at least

content.body: Especially how late it was thrown together.
we've mentioned the HTML amount element before but i get the sense that being able to refer to something that, just last week, was discussed at TPAC, and well received, helps us here
